The h1 rook is trapped; the king is trapped; and at least one of the c3 rook and bishop is tied to defending to c4 pawn. Black could win a pawn via b5, but it would almost certainly be only a temporary advantage with the doubled c-pawns, and black would ruin his structure for no good reason.
